day.quote: Everything comes too late for those who only wait.
day.author: Elbert Hubbard

day.quote: It is only the modern that ever becomes old-fashioned.
day.author: Oscar Wilde

day.quote: We have it in our power to begin the world over again.
day.author: Thomas Paine

day.quote: The moments of the past do not remain still; they retain in our memory the motion which drew them towards the future, towards a future which has itself become the past, and draw us on in their train.
day.author: Marcel Proust

day.quote: Time passes, and little by little everything that we have spoken in falsehood becomes true.
day.author: Marcel Proust

day.quote: The time which we have at our disposal every day is elastic; the passions we feel expand it, those that we inspire contract it, and habit fills up what remains.
day.author: Marcel Proust

day.quote: Time, which changes people, does not alter the image we have retained of them.
day.author: Marcel Proust

day.quote: He who controls the present, controls the past. He who controls the past, controls the future.
day.author: George Orwell

day.quote: When the past no longer illuminates the future, the spirit walks in darkness.
day.author: Alexis de Tocqueville

day.quote: Like as the waves make towards the pebbl'd shore, so do our minutes hasten to their end.
day.author: William Shakespeare

day.quote: We always overestimate the change that will occur in the next two years and underestimate the change that will occur in the next ten.
day.author: Bill Gates

day.quote: I confess, I do not believe in time.
day.author: Vladimir Nabokov

day.quote: But what minutes! Count them by sensation, and not by calendars, and each moment is a day.
day.author: Benjamin Disraeli

day.quote: Time has been transformed, and we have changed; it has advanced and set us in motion; it has unveiled its face, inspiring us with bewilderment and exhilaration.
day.author: Kahlil Gibran

day.quote: Forever is composed of nows.
day.author: Emily Dickinson

day.quote: They always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself.
day.author: Andy Warhol

day.quote: Eternity's a terrible thought. I mean, where's it all going to end?
day.author: Tom Stoppard

day.quote: I've seen the future, and it's much like the present -- only longer.
day.author: Dan Quisenberry

day.quote: The best thing about the future is that it comes only one day at a time.
day.author: Abraham Lincoln

day.quote: As if you could kill time without injuring eternity.
day.author: Henry Thoreau

day.quote: What's the point in procrastinating if you're going to have to do it anyways?
day.author: Pugsby Puggerson

night.quote: Don't try to solve serious matters in the middle of the night.
night.author: Phillip K. Dick

night.quote: The dream is the small hidden door in the deepest and most intimate sanctum of the soul, which opens to that primeval cosmic night that was soul long before there was conscious ego and will be soul far beyond what a conscious ego could ever reach.
night.author: Carl Jung

night.quote: Well enough for old folks to rise early, because they have done so many mean things all their lives they can't sleep anyhow.
night.author: Mark Twain

night.quote: I love sleep. My life has the tendency to fall apart when I'm awake, you know?
night.author: Ernest Hemingway

night.quote: A well-spent day brings happy sleep.
night.author: Leonardo da Vinci

night.quote: A few hours of mountain climbing turn a villain and a saint into two rather equal creature. Exhaustion is the shortest way to equality and fraternity, and liberty is added eventually by sleep.
night.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

night.quote: To be awake is to be alive.
night.author: Henry Thoreau

night.quote: I don't generally feel anything until noon, then it's time for my nap.
night.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

night.quote: If you can't sleep, then get up and do something instead of lying there worrying. It's the worry that gets you, not the lack of sleep.
night.author: Dale Carnegie

night.quote: Life is something that happens when you can't get to sleep.
night.author: Fran Lebowitz

night.quote: When I woke up this morning my girlfriend asked me, 'Did you sleep well?' I said 'No, I made a few mistakes.'
night.author: Steven Wright

night.quote: I have never taken any exercise except sleeping and resting.
night.author: Mark Twain

night.quote: People who say they sleep like a baby usually don't have one.
night.author: Leo Burke

night.quote: It is better to sleep on things beforehand than lie awake about them afterward.
night.author: Baltasar Gracian

night.quote: Bedbugs aren't real, they won't bite you. Go to bed.
night.author: Pugsby Puggerson
